name: The Island of Spirits DEMO
description:
The Island of Spirits is a difficult randomly generated action 2D Platformer Rogue-Like. Following the Green Knight on his adventure to get the bounty of the king. On his way he will fight cute Mushrooms, weird Crystals, bizarre creatures and defeat big bosses. Discover more about the Green Knight and about The Island of Spirits.

Currently, the game is on the demo phase. Please check my Twitter here https://twitter.com/ameidox - to get more info about the game and if you could the best way to help me right now is to Wishlist the game on Steam! (Steam page is currently not published).

You can change the Keybindings profile at Settings>Brawlhalla Style in the main menu.

Please, if you can give Feedback, go to About>Give Feedback at the main menu.

Thank you for playing! Have fun!

Key Features in The DEMO:
  • 50+ Items 
  • 6+ NPCs
  • Boss Fight
  • A Randomly  Generated Jungle
  • A shop
  • 6 Awesome Music Tracks
  • Full Controller Support
How to install:
  1. Download the file 
  2. Right click on the downloaded zip and "Extract All" to a folder.
  3. Enter the new folder and run "The Island of Spirits (Early-demo).exe"
  4. This is it! Now have fun!
 Game by:
